text: Loren Dean (born July 31, 1969) is an American actor. He was born in Las Vegas, Nevada. His career began in 1988. His best known movies are Apollo 13 (1995), How to Make an American Quilt (1995), Gattaca (1997), Enemy of the State (1998) and Space Cowboys (2000). ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Las Vegas
title: Loren Dean
